function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of ventilation in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortages of essential medical resources, including sars-cov-2 testing kits, ventilators, and personal protective equipment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparation for future pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate funding for scientific research during pandemics","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study limitations on small to medium-sized medical equipment for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitation of search strategy to two databases: google and sciencedirect","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High infection rate caused by close contact between health care workers and patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of medical robotics in treatment process","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Application of other types of robotics in hospitals for various tasks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Robotic technologies for pandemic response are expensive and have long development times, limiting their adoption for covid-19 applications.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of opioid medications and lack of palliative care training for primary caregivers and health care professionals in emergency departments and intensive care units.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection rate of health care workers leading to a shortage of health care workers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term reliance on ppe, especially face masks, may lead to complacency and reduced compliance over time, increasing the risk of disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical equipment like masks and ventilators due to high labor dependency and crowded working environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing ventilators between 2 patients increases the risk of cross-contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of makeshift ventilation solutions using off-the-shelf components and 3d printing techniques may pose risks related to device safety, reliability, and function.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of antigen tests with lower sensitivity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for ventilators","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of manual resuscitators for ventilator automation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus mutation in target region may lead to undetected covid-19 in rapid diagnostic tests.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improperly collected, transported, or handled specimens may result in false-negative results in covid-19 tests.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk of false-negative results in self-collected at-home covid-19 test kits due to improper sample collection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delays in covid-19 test results","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced performance due to virus transport medium","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate testing volume","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation in home isolation spaces can lead to increased risk of virus spread within the household.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing of communal spaces, such as toilets, in households where individuals are advised to isolate at home can increase the risk of virus transmission among family members.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate protective equipment for health care workers can increase the risk of infection while interacting with covid-19 patients.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Noise and size concerns with personal air-purifying shields","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential inconvenience and expense of daily mask cleaning and filter replacement","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High cost and unavailability of airpop masks for android users","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conceptual nature of yanko design’s smart display face shield","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clinical effectiveness measurement for face masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential hazards posed by fff technology in ppe manufacturing, including lack of head protection, fitting problems, weight problems, reduced disinfection possibility, and other disadvantages.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of additive manufacturing technologies using fff, up to a certain production volume, may lead to limited availability of ppe.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased production of 3d-printed ppe leading to potential quality control issues and defective equipment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global reliance on 3d-printed ppe leading to supply chain vulnerabilities and disruptions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid production of 3d-printed ppe without adequate sterilization processes","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases due to handling and use of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing methods for contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective medical treatment for contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of testing kits","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortages of ventilators","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient accessibility to personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and maintenance of built environment contributing to disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and understanding of disease transmission factors in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown transmission dynamics of respiratory virus in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations in academic research on fm interventions for preventing respiratory infections","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive fm interventions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlooked health-related building components","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
